text: Valentin Oehen (26 June 1931 â€“ 2 June 2022) was a Swiss politician. He was a member of Swiss Democrats. He was born in Lucerne, Switzerland. He was a member of the Swiss National Council from 1971 until 1987. Oehen died in Nottwil, Switzerland on 2 June 2022 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:People from Lucerne
title: Valentin Oehen
